Text: RE Maclaren ISDA Cc Carol I spoke to Ginette Berthel at Maclaren Energy regarding your email Regarding point below Maclaren would like its cross default threshold amount to be US million They are fine with the Enron threshold being at US million Regarding the CSA since Great Lakes Power is giving a million parental guarantee the collateral threshold amount for Maclaren should be million Your email below states that Enron parent will be giving a million parental guarantee My understanding is that this guarantee was to be million Regardless I believe that Maclaren is only willing to accept million of credit risk from both Enron entities Therefore the threshold amount should be million Please email or call me to discuss Regards Michael Akkawi Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday May PM To Cc Subject Maclaren ISDA Michael I spoke with Ed Sacks our credit person and here is a summary of where we stand on responding to your markup Rider is okay No change will be made to the Threshold Amount Early Termination Payments will be calculated using the Loss Method as this is Enrons current policy Riders and and your changes to pages and of the ISDA Schedule are okay No chnages to the CSA Schedule will be made With respect to the Guarantys we have received the Great Lakes million Guaranty and Enrons Guaranty will be amended to increase the cap to million and we will add your language Please confirm that all of this is okay with Maclaren Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax
